alert.note: Alert for Lake Casitas; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 27 at 2:09PM PDT until October 29 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 3 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast, Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range, Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains and Lake Casitas. * WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to 3 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...On the Santa Barbara South Coast, winds will be mainly confined to elevations above 300 feet, but some brief gusts are possible down to the coast.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Casitas; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range
